Homebridge Camera FFmpeg
ContributingTested Configurations

Tested Configurations

iSpyConnect maintains a large database of camera manufacturers, supported methods (MJPEG, FFMPEG, RTSP), and the necessary URLs for accessing video, audio, and stills.

If you don’t know, or can’t find this information, start with this website.

While many of these configurations use the -re option in their source configs, it is strongly recommended that you do not use that, as it may cause problems with live video.

  • Alptop AT-200B

  • Amcrest IP2M-841

  • Amcrest IP3M-HX2W: HOOBS + Raspberry Pi 4

  • Amcrest IP4M-1026

  • Amcrest IPM-HX1B: with MP4 Passthrough

  • Anran DVR: Generic Chinese DVR

  • August Doorbell Cam Version 1

  • Avtech AVM542B

  • Avtech MDR751B DVR

  • Axis M3024-L: with Raspberry Pi 3 Model B

  • Blue Iris

  • CNB IVP4030VR: via RPI Model B

  • Reolink camera: with better picture (rtmp) and audio (Ffmpeg tutorial)

  • ReoLink Camera RLC-410: (Should work with all ReoLink-Cams supporting RTSP)
